means: 极端利己主义者，极端自我主义者，自大狂

sentence.Network_en: Adam is clever enough, but he's also something of an egomaniac.
sentence.Network_cn: 亚当足够聪明，但是他也有点自私自利。

sentence.Network_en: This egomaniac I work for has had it out for me since I dumped him.
sentence.Network_cn: 我的那个自大狂上司自从我甩了他之后他就一直找我麻烦.

sentence.Network_en: Mitch is a self - centered egomaniac.
sentence.Network_cn: 米奇是一个以 自我 为中心的极端利己主义者.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...戴高乐（ Charles de Gaulle）是「自大狂」（ egomaniac）；未来印度总理甘地夫人（ Indira Gandhi）是个「酸溜溜、爱出风头的 …
如何背英语单词又快又好 - 已解决 - 搜搜问问 ... egomania → 极端利己主义 egomaniac → 极端利己主义者 -erg- → 表示“工作”.
弗爵爷传奇是怎样炼成的 - FT速读测试 -... ... uprooting 连根拔除 egomaniac 极端自我主义者 transfix 刺穿，使呆住.
...主义」（egocentrism）、甚至有可能变为「自我狂」（egomaniac），造成团体斗争与社会不安。

entry.tran: 利己主义者;自我主义者
entry.def: An egomaniac is someone who thinks only of themselves and does not care if they harm other people in order to get what they want.

example.ex: Adam is clever enough, but he's also something of an egomaniac.
example.tran: 亚当足够聪明，但是他也有点自私自利。

auth_sentence.content: Or is he a misinformed, prejudiced egomaniac with an opinion?
auth_sentence.res_content: Or is he a misinformed, prejudiced egomaniac with an opinion?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Or is he a misinformed, prejudiced egomaniac with an opinion?

auth_sentence.content: West, allegedly an egomaniac, worked his ass off and kept censoring himself pre-emptively.
auth_sentence.res_content: West, allegedly an egomaniac, worked his ass off and kept censoring himself pre-emptively.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: West, allegedly an egomaniac, worked his ass off and kept censoring himself pre-emptively.
